ExportDifferential.Statement:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SELECT @@ EXPORT_FIELDS @@ FROM w2_AdvCodeMediaType WHERE w2_AdvCodeMediaType.date_changed >= @date_changed ORDER BY w2_AdvCodeMediaType.advcode_media_type_id ASC

ExportAll.Statement:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SELECT @@ EXPORT_FIELDS @@ FROM w2_AdvCodeMediaType ORDER BY w2_AdvCodeMediaType.advcode_media_type_id ASC
